p: The antioxidant activity of the aromatic plants investigated was assessed using a redox titration method [ 49] via titration of a 0.01 N KMnO 4 solution with the ethanolic extract of the plants. The reduction of KMnO 4 to colorless Mn +2 in this process reflects the quantity of antioxidants dissolvable in 70% ethanol. The values were expressed in mg gallic acid equivalents (mg GAE g âˆ’1 dw). In recent years, the method gained great popularity between biochemists due to simplicity and cheapness [ 50].
